exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 Hprime : prime p n : nat Hn : n < p Hx : exist (fun x : nat => x < p) n Hn <> Zp a : nat Heqa : a = proj1_sig Op Unable to unify "n * p" with "n".

In environment p : nat Hp : p = 0 -> False n : nat Hn : n < p Hx : exist (fun x : nat => x < p) n Hn = Zp -> False x : nat l : x < p H0 : forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \\/ q = p q : nat Hprimeq : prime q Hd1 : divides q p Hd2 : divides q n H : nat Unable to unify "nat" with "p = 1".

original: intros Hprime x Hx. destruct x as [n Hn]. remember (proj1_sig x) as a. assert (divides p (n * 1)). exists n. rewrite Nat.mul_1_r. reflexivity. apply Hprime in H. assert (Hcoprime : is_gcd p n 1). apply no_common_prime_is_coprime. - auto. - intros q Hprimeq Hd1 Hd2. destruct H. subst. apply Hd1. exists 1. lia. contradict Hd2.
